about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Backend Developer (Java/Spring Boot, Node.js) | BSc Computer Science | Former Research Scientist (PhD)

journey.title: Who I Am
description: Backend Developer with a BSc in Computer Science (2026) and international research experience with a PhD in Entomology (INRAE, France). I have accumulated over 2,200 hours of hands-on software development practice, focused on Java/Spring Boot and REST APIs.
Certified Java Spring Expert (200h) and Java Spring Professional (120h) by DevSuperior, with validated skills in TDD, unit and integration testing, Spring Security, and OAuth2/JWT.

whatSetsMeApart.title: What Sets Me Apart
whatSetsMeApart.description: My background in scientific research (INRAE, France) gave me mastery of data analysis, systematic thinking, and experience in complex projects with international teams. I apply that rigor to software development: clean code, clear documentation, and a focus on quality.

doctorate.title: Doctor of Science in Entomology
doctorate.description: UFRPE (2009-2013) | Visiting Scholar: University of Nebraska-Lincoln (USA)

backend.title: Backend
backend.description: Java 21, Spring Boot 3.5, Spring Security (OAuth2, JWT), JPA/Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js

testing.title: Testing
testing.description: JUnit 5, Mockito, TDD, Jacoco, MockMvc, RestAssured
